resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
shiro615 commented on pull request #4749: ARROW-5784: [Release][GLib] Replace c_glib/ after running c_glib/autogen.sh in dev/release/02-source.sh
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4749
 
 
   c_glib/ source archive is generated by `make dist` because includes configure script.
   The current `dev/release/02-source.sh` build Arrow C++ and Arrow GLib to include the artifacts of GTK-Doc and then run `make dist`.  But it is slow. 
   So this PR run only `c_glib/autogen.sh` and then replace c_glib/.
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

shiro615 commented on pull request #4749: ARROW-5784: [Release][GLib] Replace c_glib/ after running c_glib/autogen.sh in dev/release/02-source.sh
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4749#discussion_r298793839
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/release/source/Dockerfile
 ##########
 @@ -19,33 +19,14 @@ FROM ubuntu:18.04
 
 ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive
 
-RUN apt-get update -y -q && \
 
 Review comment:
   I've removed the libraries for building Arrow C++, because just runs `c_glib/autogen.sh`.

shiro615 commented on pull request #4749: ARROW-5784: [Release][GLib] Replace c_glib/ after running c_glib/autogen.sh in dev/release/02-source.sh
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4749#discussion_r298794011
 
 

 ##########
 File path: ci/travis_release_test.sh
 ##########
 @@ -29,4 +29,4 @@ sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https
 sudo apt-get update
 sudo apt-get install dotnet-sdk-2.2
 
-dev/release/run-test.rb
+ARROW_TEST_SOURCE_GLIB=yes dev/release/run-test.rb
 
 Review comment:
   I've enabled the test for GLib configure. Because this PR reduces the test time of this option.
   But if you don't want to enable this option, I will remove this.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
c_glib/ source archive is generated by `make dist` because includes configure script.
The current `dev/release/02-source.sh` build Arrow C++ and Arrow GLib to include the artifacts of GTK-Doc and then run `make dist`. But it is slow. 
So run only `c_glib/autogen.sh` and then replace c_glib/.
fields.summary: [Release][GLib] Replace c_glib/ after running c_glib/autogen.sh in dev/release/02-source.sh
